metadata.Title: CVE-2021-37746 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: textview_uri_security_check in textview.c in Claws Mail before 3.18.0, and Sylpheed through 3.7.0, does not have sufficient link checks before accepting a click.

criterions.comment: claws-mail: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
sylpheed: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
